req_text: ERA * UNISIG * EEIG ERTMS USERS GROUP SUBSET-026-2 3.6.0 13/05/2016 System Requirements Specification Chapter 2 Basic System Description Page 20/25 2.6.5.2 Summary of characteristics of Application Level 1 2.6.5.2.1 Trackside equipment:  Eurobalises for spot transmission from track to train.  Eurobalises must be able to transmit variable information.  Semi continuous infill transmission by using Euroloop or radio infill is optional.
